function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ambiguous information about outbreak handling by the government","Impact":"Loss of trust in risk communication and governance","Mitigation":"Timely disclosure of relevant information to build trust","Technologies":"Improved risk communication strategies, social media monitoring tools","People":"General public, government officials","Owner":"Government, communication experts"},{"Description":"Spread of rumors and conspiracy theories online","Impact":"Increased confusion and misinformation about the outbreak","Mitigation":"Regular refutation of rumors, dissemination of accurate information","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, fact-checking algorithms","People":"General public, government officials","Owner":"Government, media organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in risk communication","Impact":"Erosion of trust due to equivocal risk messages","Mitigation":"Acknowledge and communicate the inherent uncertainty, frame messages within the uncertainty","Technologies":"Improved risk communication strategies, public awareness campaigns","People":"General public, risk communication experts","Owner":"Government, risk communication experts"}]}
